item.p: Find the derivative of f(x)\cdot g(x).
Find the value of the derivative of f(x) \cdot h(x) at x={{x1}}.
Find the value of the derivative of \displaystyle \frac{g(x)}{h(x)} at x={{x2}}.

Consider the function r(x) = {{f}} \cdot x . Find r'(x), r''(x), r'''(x), and r^{(iv)}(x) so the first, second, third, and fourth derivative of r(x). What pattern do you notice? What do you expect the twelfth derivative of r(x) to be?
Patterns will vary but functions involved should repeat every four derivatives.
